title: Waldorf by Freda Sack
content:
Hello all  
I’m looking for further information on the attached face. Sorry for the cropped pages—someone sent them to me who could not scan the whole sheet. These are Letraset sheets dated 1986 and the name of the face at bottom is Waldorf, designed by Freda Sack. Is this face in existence in digital format, maybe under a new name? Is it a revival of an earlier design? If so, from where and whom? Thanks for any info in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Waldorf.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070402063825/http:/typophile.com/files/Waldorf.jpg) | 190.01 KB |
author: carolina

comments.content:
I don’t know if Waldorf has been digitized, but you could perhaps try contacting Freda Sack at [The Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20070402063825/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/).

Also, this Google search links to various online lists of her digital typefaces:

http://www.google.com/search?client=safari&rls=en&q=freda+sack+fonts&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8
